main_definition: Barbados is an island country in the Caribbean, known as a former British colony with rich cultural history and diverse natural landscapes.

meanings_and_examples.example: We will be traveling to Barbados for our next vacation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Former British colony in the Caribbean
meanings_and_examples.example: Barbados gained independence from Britain in 1966 after being a former British colony.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Name of an idiom related to football or cricket
meanings_and_examples.example: The Barbados national team, also known as the Buccaneers, is well-known for its performance in regional sports competitions.
